item.title: Outside 24 St P Way, 4th September
item.description:
Gully jammed with silt. Not much use.

item.title: Tenants BLOCKING THE PARKING, 4th September
item.description:
People who lives there keep blocking the parking with chairs, scooters, bikes or toys and seating outside in the parking space making impossible for other people to park. They do NOT have even a car or pay a parking

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Arden Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Formica work surface left against our wall., 4th September
item.description:
I only noticed this today, it may have been here a bit longer. It is too large for me to move myself.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Yorkton Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Drain outside 174 has been blocked and reported many times, 4th September
item.description:
Drain outside 174 has been blocked and reported many times over many years and nothing has been done about it. It floods the street every time there is heavy rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tachbrook Street, Pimlico, London

item.title: Just east of 102 St P Way, 4th September
item.description:

item.title: Large packs of loose dogs with dog walkers, 4th September
item.description:
We are seeing an increase in large packs of loose dogs being walked on Footscray Meadows by 'professional' dog walkers who have no control on them. My dog who was on a lead was surrounded by 10 dogs with one dog walker who made no attempt to control them when they attacked my dog. There is no effort on the part of these dog walkers to clear up after the packs and the problems are increasing now that other boroughs have sensibly introduced restrictions on the number of dogs being walked so the large packs are now heading onto Footscray Meadows.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, The Grove, North Cray, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All day commercial rubbish, 4th September

item.title: Bins either missed or tipped over, 4th September
item.description:
We have had very erratic bin collections on Pepys Road for the last few weeks, with bins frequently being missed, or collected but left strewn across the pavement. We have a newborn son and this makes accessing our house unnecessarily difficult.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Pepys Road, New Cross Gate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sherwin road covered in rubbish, 4th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Pepys Road, New Cross Gate, London
